text: i would like to say "that was my point" but i would just be lying. I am crushingly lonely zem.

text:
But you have that... weird black guy to keep you company!

I swear that guy is a cardboard cutout of John Travolta's lovechild with Lil Wayne

name: ganymedeio
text: Hee hee!  Oh, hee hee!

name: belgand
text:
I don't get the politics angle. I mean, I see where you're coming from, but I'm far more likely to vote for a dude or a lady who is totally into making the most of their sex. I'd probably even put it in the campaign literature. A dude who has had hella hot group sexings? That's a dude I can trust to look after my interests and get things done .

I don't buy it though. Molly seems a bit more conservative than that and I think she'd probably balk at the idea. Beef would be far, far too nervous to bring it up let alone go through with it.

name: greenkoolayd
text: roast beef barely has enough confidence to have sex with molly.  i sincerely doubt that he would be cocky enough to add someone else in the mix.

name: epicurus
text: IMO, Beef is DEFINITELY joking. Beef has not had a three-way. This is God's Law.

name: scorpio_nadir
text:
Beef has been in a 3-way. He was driving while Ray was sexing the hottie in the backseat.
The end.

name: puguglypress
text: No wonder last Saturday was such a disappointment

name: dissembly
text: YES. The missing person from what could have been a great four-way was *Molly*.

name: postblank
text: Beef, you were in a three way?  How come?

name: tellumo
text: Beef's been in a three-way. Twice. Couldn't stand it. All that commotion . Dear lord spare him from that awful group sex.

name: quinlaenar
text: Nice one, except thats his grandpa.

name: sustainability
text: Good catch, except that it's Ray's grandpa, and I am a bitter lonely virgin.

name: quinlaenar
text: I don't even remember making that comment, have no idea why I would have left the apostraphe off of 'that's', and it was a dick thing to say not to mention being wrong.

name: srikamaraja
text: Success with the ladies does not preclude massive depression.

name: epicurus
text:
Just so, srikamarja.

It would be apt to say that, for your hetero-type guy, success with the ladies is a necessary but not sufficient condition for not being massively depressed.

Science styles.

name: nutmeg
text: the playboy advice columnest is actually quite perceptive

text: the playboy advisor is the most columnest.

name: centipede_damascus
text: Beef reacts in the same way any guy would who saw a letter from his girlfriend in Playboy Advisor.

name: pa_ass_nts
text: The Playboy advisor arc, short though it is, is a good'un.

name: relaxing
text: The Playboy Advisor qualifies as a recurring character, I think.

name: saru
text:
He's definitely just being sarcastic about three-ways vs four-ways. For him, it's similar to the best kind of caviar to serve on your private jet (didn't you know, high-altitudes dry out baluga!)

Also, I wouldn't think that the Playboy advisor would be syndicated, so I guess we know that Molly's the kind of gal who would pick up a playboy. Neat.

text: I tried using the phrase "well I'll be diddled" but I did not get a good reaction.

text: There's an easy joke right there...

text:
Today's Blogs

Ray: What's goin' on with Tina, etc

text: How is this not rated higher? Have we not all been in this situation?

name: riazm
text: I will pay five dollars to see the text Chris Onstad typed in the other column.

name: cryztal
text: it is of my opinion that three-ways never actually happen. It is suggested, somebody freaks out, and either break ups ensue, or somebody sleeps on the futon for a while.

name: goatmasterflash
text: You assume that 3-ways always occur between an established couple and an add-on. I assure you, this is not the case. Sometimes, there are no break-ups to be had or futons to be slept upon, even in the instance of a three-way not being a unanimous success.

name: cryztal
text: Where the fuck were these three-some-having singles when I WAS SINGLE GODDAMNIT.

name: goatmasterflash
text: hey, if you have a comfy futon you can crash on and/or ever want to be single again, give me a call.

name: heccibiggs
text: Sometimes they happen between three very drunk girls who are all very close friends, and remain close friends after the event and still are to this day.

name: goatmasterflash
text: mmm, put butter on what she said!

text: or baby oil

text:
Wait wait wait

What was I thinking writing this here?

ASSETBAR CAN WE HAVE DELETE COMMENT OPTION NOW PLEASE

text:
haha oh wow i didn't even get the chance to read that juicy little piece of lore until you commented again and it showed up on the recent comments!

oh brother wait til everybody on the current strip gets a load of this

name: woodenteeth
text: I am from the currentest strip. *snigger*

name: rasalghul
text: The internet begs to differ.  Vehemently.

name: straw
text: I want to know what's going on in the next column.  Here are the words I can make out: I, crav(e)(ing), this, the, does, with, person(s), business, ethic(s), appolog(y)(ise), advance, am, John, attorney, law)

name: tekende
text:
Apologize only contains one p, though, so I'm not sure what the "appol" would be.

Also, "induce(d)(ing)", and "send". And I think the second word might be "hunger".

name: schroedingsrcat
text: Last saturday?

name: jezebel
text:
This is my worst nightmare.

No. Really. I have terrible, terrible dreams about someone asking advice about me in a publication. But in my dreams, I'm not even allowed the comfort of the publication being Playboy. It's always O! By Oprah.

This is why I try not to sleep anymore.

name: sp1derbaby
text: Beef has always read Playboy for the articles.

name: laserblade
text: Why not?  It's not real porn.

name: belgand
text:
Though it's not up to the quality it used to be I'd be much more likely to subscribe if they increased the Advisor (Onstad gets it right, it's the best thing in there) to three or four pages and picked out the best of the various articles and short fiction and just ran it as it's own magazine without the soft-core shots of cheap, largely unpleasant-looking women and celebrities who want more attention.

If you had a magazine where I could look forward to a lengthy interview with a significant cultural and/or political figure, an article by Hunter S. Thompson, some short fiction from Chuck Palahniuk, and about 4 pages of the Advisor it would probably be one of the best magazines that could ever exist. Instead it's a shadow of its former self and basically a slightly classier version of FHM with actual rather than implied nudity.

name: carlyle
text: A truely sophisticated man makes Groucho Marx references no matter the context.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: four-versus-three: truth.
